data.message: Sunday, 10th December as a surprise birthday present for my Mother. She's never been to a concert before and I hope to make her 70th birthday THE BEST birthday she's ever had. After all the struggles she's been through, I want her to have the time of her life =) She's a huge fan of Ed Sheeran as well  #capitalfm #cocacolagb #capitaljbb #motherslove #holidaysarecoming #christmas #birthdaypresent
